params._address: Address to check the amount of funds donated by.

fund().notice: A function to fund the contract.

getAllDonators().notice: A function to get all the donators to a contract.

getAmountDonated(address).notice: A function to get the amount of funds donated by an address.

getContractOwner().notice: A function to get the contract owner.

getTotalValueDonated().notice: A function which returns the total value donated to a contract.

withdraw().notice: This is a function to withdraw all the funds from a contract,         can be called only by the contract owner.
